definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: Working with the right queue is the task of the adapter configuration, as detailed above.
sentences.chinese: 調用正確的隊列是適配器配置的工作，如上文中所述。

sentences.english: There are plenty of extras, including a cigarette-lighter adapter.
sentences.chinese: 有很多羣衆演員，包括香菸打火機適配器。

sentences.english: The next line configures the email adapter.
sentences.chinese: 下一行配置了電子郵件適配器。

sentences.english: You can use technology adapters to integrate to a wide range of applications.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用技術適配器集成到應用程序的更廣範圍。

sentences.english: Instead, connectors and protocol adapters are used.
sentences.chinese: 而是使用連接器和協議適配器。

sentences.english: Power adaptors are cheap, usually costing $2 or less.
sentences.chinese: 電力適配器價格低廉，通常不超過2美元。

sentences.english: This adapter supports outbound mode only.
sentences.chinese: 此適配器僅支持出站模式。

sentences.english: Both support a wide variety of network adapters.
sentences.chinese: 都支持多種類型的網絡適配器。

sentences.english: The adapters now have icons on the pallet.
sentences.chinese: 適配器現在在托盤上具有圖標。

sentences.english: This means you can also operate it from your vehicle's cigarette lighter adapter.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着你也能夠在你的汽車的點菸器適配器它。

sentences.english: At Environment, select the environment for the analysis adaptor.
sentences.chinese: 在環境模式下，爲分析適配器模板選擇一個環境。

sentences.english: The host-side adapter inherits from the host view of the add-in.
sentences.chinese: 宿主端適配器從外接程序的宿主視圖中繼承。

sentences.english: This paper describe the principle and structure of SFN Adapter's design in detail.
sentences.chinese: 本文詳細介紹了單頻網適配器的設計原理和結構。

sentences.english: I created a map of each cable and which adapter it was plugged into.
sentences.chinese: 我記錄了每條線纜和它原來插入的適配器的對應關係。

sentences.english: Built-in protocol transformation capabilities and support for multiple types of adapters.
sentences.chinese: 內置協議轉換功能並支持多種類型的適配器。
